flawed_nl_solution:
The craft store made 36 / 3 = <<36/3=12>>12 sales in the fabric section.
It made 36 / 4 = <<36/4=9>>9 sales in the jewelry section.
Thus, there were 36 - 12 - 9 = <<36-12-9=10>>10 sales in the stationery section.
#### 10

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 15, not 10. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
